byline.contributor: Mia Li and Edy Yin contributed research.

snippet: When a Chinese dissident was awarded the 2010 Nobel Peace Prize, a patriotic group came up with their own award. Now, intrigue has put it in doubt.
lead_paragraph: When a Chinese dissident was awarded the 2010 Nobel Peace Prize, a patriotic group came up with their own award. Now, intrigue has put it in doubt.

headline.main: Competing Confucius Award Bares Discord in China
headline.print_headline: Political Intrigue Confounds A Wise Man’s Inspiration in China
headline.seo: Competing Confucius Award Bares Discord in China
